template.p: You just installed the Odoo for Property Management package. By doing so, we have installed a bunch of necessary apps to run your bar efficiently.
Discover the basics of this package and explore all the possibilities Odoo offers to improve your experience.
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: CRM App: Manage your leads efficiently, tracking ongoing buying and selling opportunities in a visual pipeline.
Properties App: Organize your portfolio with a dedicated app to manage property listings, contracts, and availability status.
Subscriptions App: Automate the collection of recurring rent and service charges with flexible billing cycles, ensuring consistent cash flow and effortless lease renewals.
Sales App: Handle offers, negotiations, and closing deals with professional quotations and digital signatures.
Website App: Drive qualified traffic by promoting your listings on a beautiful, mobile-responsive property management portal.

Contacts App: Centralize all stakeholder data, managing the unique relationships between property owners, tenants, and service providers within a single, searchable directory with full communication history.

template.p: By uploading this module's demo data, your database has been filled with a few products, sale orders and more.

template.p: From the Properties App, you can define the physical assets you manage.

ul.li: Open the Properties: Open the Properties App and navigate through the app menu Properties / Properties.

li.div: Create a Property: Click "New" to create a unit. Fill in its building, location and other details.

template.p: The Subscriptions App handles the legal and financial bridge between the property and the tenant.

ul.li: Open the Contracts: Open the Properties App to reach the Subscriptions.
Create a Contract: Click "New" and select the tenant as the "Customer" and add the Rental fee product.
Select the Property: Select the "Property" to rent.
Timeline: Specify the start date, the recurring period (monthly, quarterly, etc.) and the expiration of the contract.
Move-in Logs: Utilize the dedicated property tab to record meter readings (water, electricity) at the time of the tenant's entry to ensure accurate utility re-billing later.

template.p: Click on the Availability to view your portfolio in a Gantt view.

ul.li: Open the Availability: Open the Properties App and navigate through the app menu Availability.
This screen visualizes all active rental contracts and identifies vacancies at a glance.
